content: **i use this pattern frequently for charitable causes ** can be finished off with 2 rounds half_double_crochet rib as in the plain light gray cap the blue/yellow striped hat was inspired by the color scheme of the crocheted hats worn by sweden s olympic athletes during the opening ceremonies note this is **not** the hat worn by the athletes but i wanted to use the color combo in a project i worked the pattern to the 77 st point changing the 4 colors at random in this sequence 5 rnds off-white 1 round black 2 rnds pale yellow 4 rnds baby blue 2 rnds off-white 2 rnds pale yellow 1 round black 5 rnds baby blue 3 rnds pale yellow 2 rnds off-white 1 round black 4 rnds baby blue light blue/dark blue and gray/plum soft striped hats in red heart symphony worked on size k/10 5 6 5 mm hook to 60 sts decreased to 48 on last few rounds for tighter fit at brim 1 http //www merlins com/news php#snug%20hugs%20for%20kids
